detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Intermediate Latin II. Visit amne.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.

If the course is full or blocked, or if you do not meet restrictions for the available seats, please register for the waitlist. Students will be moved manually from the waitlist into the course section in order of registration. If the course is blocked but showing available seats, this is normal and means that waitlist transfer have not yet taken place. Email amne.undergrad@ubc.ca with any questions.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: This intensive seminar meets Tues & Thurs, Feb 25, Feb 27, Mar 4 and Mar 6 in Allard 115. Course conflicts are allowed for this seminar, but you must contact (studentaffairs@allard.ubc.ca) to register you in this seminar in that case. Students may be penalized a participation or attendance grade for missing an intensive class or a class that conflicts with the intensive class.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
